{"name": "GMHC Meals Program", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Distribution inside agency lobby as well as the 4th and 5th floors of the building, located at 307 West 38th Street.

community members that are not GMHC clients must make a reservation beforehand by calling the nutrition team, or reserving a spot via Plentifulapp.com. First-time attendees can be registered upon arrival.


Pre-packaged, shelf-stable pantry bags and ready to eat meals
Fresh produce and eggs (for GMHC clients)
Two services of produce (for GMHC clients)", "email": "", "url": "https://www.gmhc.org/services/meals-nutrition/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "307 West 38th Street", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10018", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.75514449999999, "longitude": -73.99232529999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 367-1000", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Wear Facemask"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
